compliant.section: This Privacy and Cookies Policy is provided by FitTech Co., Ltd. ("FitTech", or "we") to explain to you what personal data may be collected through the websites linked to this Policy and how such personal data may be used.
compliant.legal provisions: Information provided before the collection of personal data

compliant.section: If you have any questions or comments about this Policy, please contact us at service@fittech.com.tw.

We collect different categories of personal data on our websites (www.fittech.com.tw), which may include personal and business contact information such as your name, corporate name, job title, contact number, physical and email address, and other information you have provided or is required to process a transaction, service, inquiry or request.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We may not be able to fulfill a request if we do not receive the personal data required.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: The personal data collected may be used to respond to your inquiries or requests such as replying to your inquiry of products, replying to your questions you submit, help us maintain and upgrade the quality of our websites and the services these websites provide, and any other use described at the point we collect the personal data.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We may disclose your personal data to third party providers (in particular, to enable them to execute certain web services for us, such as web hosting or maintenance services).
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We may also share this information with FitTech’s affiliates and agents to fulfil your request for information/order.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We do not sell any personally identifiable information.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: We reserve the right to disclose such personal data to any other third party if we believe that we are required or permitted to do so by law, including, where applicable, (i) to comply with legal processes or governmental requests; (ii) to prevent, investigate, detect or prosecute criminal offences or attacks on the technical integrity of the web site or our network; and (iii) to protect the rights, property or safety of FitTech, the users of the website, or the public.
compliant.legal provisions: Information about the processing of personal data

compliant.section: You can disable these cookies at any time by adjusting the settings of your browser (e . g . Microsoft Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome) .
compliant.legal provisions: Consent requires a clear affirmative act establishing a freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous indication of the data subject's agreement.

compliant.section: Your Rights To the extent required by applicable law, you are entitled to obtain information on the processing of your personal data, access your personal data, object to or restrict the processing of your personal data, make use of your right to data portability where applicable, and have your personal data rectified or deleted .
compliant.legal provisions: Provides data subjects with rights to information about their data, access to their data, rectification of inaccurate data, erasure of data, restriction of processing, and objection to processing.

compliant.section: You are also entitled to withdraw at any time the consent that you have given with respect to the processing of your personal data .
compliant.legal provisions: Data subjects have the right to withdraw consent at any time.

compliant.section: Retention of Your Personal Data We endeavor to retain your personal data for no longer than what is allowed under the applicable data protection laws and, in any case, for no longer than what is necessary for the purpose for which such personal data was collected or otherwise processed .
compliant.legal provisions: Personal data shall be kept in a form which permits identification of data subjects for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which the personal data are processed.

non_compliant.section: This Policy applies solely to the processing of your personal data which may be collected through our websites. The Internet pages to which our external links lead are not included.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that it does not apply to third-party websites and that users should review the privacy policies of those websites.

non_compliant.section: To enable us to provide a better user experience, we also use cookies to collect certain information concerning your use of our websites such as the IP address of the computer you are using, the type of browser software and operating system that you use, and other similar information.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the specific purpose of using cookies and obtain explicit consent from users before storing or accessing cookies on their devices. It should also explain how users can withdraw their consent.

non_compliant.section: Our websites use cookies to collect certain information concerning your use of our websites, to improve your user experience, as well as to analyze and collect statistics regarding our web traffic.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state the specific purpose of using cookies and obtain explicit consent from users before storing or accessing cookies on their devices. It should also explain how users can withdraw their consent.

non_compliant.section: Disabling cookies will make it impossible to use member-related functions
non_compliant.amend: The policy should not make consent to cookies a precondition for using the website's services if those services are not strictly necessary and require cookies. Users should be able to access basic website functionality without accepting cookies.

non_compliant.section: Mandatory cookies created to provide better user security, or to enhance user's experience with our websites . If you do not want us to collect such information, you must cease using our website immediately . By continuing to use our website, you accept that these necessary Cookies are vital for provision of such services and will be placed on your browser as normal .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent should not be the legal basis for processing where there is a clear imbalance between the data subject and the controller. Continued use of a service cannot be considered freely given consent.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify that 'mandatory cookies' are strictly necessary for the provision of the service requested by the user. All other cookies, even if related to improving user experience, require explicit consent.

non_compliant.section: Functional cookies that allow our website to remember if you have previously visited the site or the choices you make (such as your language, region or preferences) to provide a more personalized online experience .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.  It is unlikely that simply visiting a website or using its basic functions constitutes valid consent for functional cookies.
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with a clear and affirmative action to consent to the use of functional cookies. This could be through a cookie banner with granular options or a settings page.

non_compliant.section: Performance cookies that collect how a user uses our sites, for example which pages user visits, the areas you have visited, the time spent on the website . These cookies provide analytical information so we can improve our sites' usability . One example is Google Analytics, Google AdWords .
non_compliant.legal provisions: Similar to functional cookies, using performance cookies, especially those linked to third-party services like Google Analytics, requires explicit and informed consent.
non_compliant.amend: Provide users with a clear way to consent to performance cookies separately from other types of cookies. Clearly inform users about the use of Google Analytics or similar tools and how they can opt-out.
